post:
We currently have a bunch of remaining stock dedicated servers in Frankfurt, Germany available. All offers come with a dedicated 1Gbit Uplink, 5TB Traffic, DDoS-Protection up to 250Gbit (Layer 3 - Layer 7) and iLO / IPMI remote management access. Orders are provisioned within seven working days.

The smallest available dedicated server comes with a Intel Xeon L5520, 16GB DDR3 ECC Ram and 1TB disk for only 39 EUR per month, prepaid and with not setup fees.

Just check it out: https://my.combahton.net/dedicated_stock.php

Extra upgrades like subnets, 10Gbit uplinks or hardware (cpu, ram, disks) are also possible. Just mail (support@kms-hosting.com) us your requirements ;-)
